Name: Ghost Cash Collect
About the game: A brave young ghost set out on an epic adventure to find money, but he ended up locked inside a mysterious shack. Suddenly, money started appearing before his eyes. Collect an endless supply of cash and unlock costumes with fun abilities to help you collect cash faster! The goal of the game is to collect a million cash to buy the magical key that will let you out of the shack. Features an epic story with an intro and ending cutscene, 8 costumes to unlock and 4 map skins to buy!
